parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided text.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post explicitly mentions Ciprian Serban, a candidate for the Chamber of Deputies, and prominently features his image alongside that of Marcel Ciolacu, the PSD president.  This directly refers to a candidate participating in the parliamentary elections, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and the content is not a private message. The use of paid advertising indicates an intention to reach a wide audience, fulfilling the requirement of Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The post's title, "Votează calea sigură pentru Neamț" (Vote the safe path for Neamț), directly encourages voters to support the PSD candidates. The content further highlights Serban's political achievements and connections within the PSD, aiming to enhance his image and increase voter support. This clearly demonstrates an electoral objective, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - c. The overall tone and content are designed to positively influence voters' perception of Serban and the PSD.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. While the post presents information about Ciprian Serban, it lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic reporting. The language used is highly positive and promotional, lacking critical analysis or diverse perspectives. The focus is on promoting Serban and the PSD, not on providing balanced information.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The post does not express a personal opinion; instead, it presents information in a manner clearly intended to promote a political candidate and influence voters' choices. The positive portrayal of Serban and the PSD is not presented as a personal viewpoint but as a factual account aimed at swaying public opinion.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>509034284929292</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, paid for by Moldova Invest, promotes Ciprian Serban, a PSD candidate for the Chamber of Deputies. The post's title, "Votează calea sigură pentru Neamț," directly encourages voters to support Serban and the PSD. The content focuses on Serban's political achievements and connections within the PSD, aiming to improve his image and increase voter support.  The post uses positive language and lacks the objectivity of journalistic reporting.  The targeting of Neamț County, the use of paid advertising on a public platform, and the clear intention to influence voters' choices all point towards electoral propaganda.  The post's content and presentation are designed to positively influence voters' perception of Serban and the PSD, thus fulfilling the criteria for electoral propaganda under Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate>
    <name>CIPRIAN CONSTANTIN SERBAN</name>
    <impact>POSITIVE</impact>
  </candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>Moldova Invest</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Societatea Moldova Invest, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 509034284929292) cu conținut electoral, care promovează candidatul Ciprian Constantin Șerban (PSD) la Camera Deputaților. Postarea, cu titlul „Votează calea sigură pentru Neamț”, are un efect electoral clar, vizând influențarea votului în favoarea candidatului PSD prin prezentarea sa într-o lumină pozitivă și evidențierea realizărilor sale politice.  Această postare, plătită cu o sumă sub 100 RON, a atins o estimare de 100.000 - 500.000 de persoane în județul Neamț, conform datelor din Ad Library.  Contactul Moldova Invest poate fi realizat la adresa de email contact@moldovainvest.newsmoldova.ro sau la numărul de telefon +40772021599.  Lipsa obiectivității și neutralității, caracteristice jurnalismului, precum și prezentarea unilaterală a informațiilor, demonstrează intenția clară de a influența votul, constituind astfel propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea campaniei electorale.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
